MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, however our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on the underground fault outside Harris Drive affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:47am on Monday, 26 April 2021
